long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Evolve your avatar based on your digital footprint. A must have extension for the avatar to evolve and get insights to your digital footprint.

Some features included for this "Alpha"
* Evolve avatar based on your data
* Encyclopedia of avatars
* Export avatar as profile

More productivity features coming soon...

Go to https://hypersonas.com/ to link with your web app for evolution and other features.

Data
* Hypersona collects data anonymously. We cannot identity who you are personally.

Privacy is at the center. We plan to empower users by helping them truly own their data.
